alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 11:38AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...River flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Green River at Colrain * WHEN...Until 245 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Green River at Colrain is in minor flood stage and still rising. Minor flooding is possible along the Green River near Colrain over the next 3 hours. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1138 AM EST, The Green River river gauge at Colrain is in Minor flood stage and still rising. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.1 to 0.3 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Greenfield, Deerfield, Shelburne, Colrain and Leyden. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
